title: Ebook - Peace and War - United States Foreign Policy     1931-19
description:
On January 2, 1943, the Department of State released a publication entitled ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œPeace and War: United States Foreign Policy, 1931-1941ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½, containing references to a number of documents concerning the conduct of the foreign relations of the United States during that ten-year period.  It was stated at the time that these documents would be published later.  They are accordingly published herein, together with a reprint of the publication released on January 2.  The present publication presents a record of policies and acts by which the United States sought to promote conditions of peace and world order and to meet the world-wide dangers resulting from Japanese, German and Italian aggression.


These Historic documents are in the Public Domain.
